TopicTitle: Removing a poll from a thread

Articles.Content:
Hi

I've added a poll to my MOD development thread. Now it is pretty obsolete. Is there any way to remove it again?

Sorry if it is a pretty basic question, but I'm relatively new to the forums.

Thanks in advance for your help.

You need to contact an administrator like myself via [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25176-Need-a-Thread-Moving-Removing-Closing-or-Post-Deleted) or by reporting the opening post of the thread and stating your request that way.

I assume you're talking about [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114401)? If that's the one, I can remove it as soon as you want.

> 
> You need to contact an administrator like myself via [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25176-Need-a-Thread-Moving-Removing-Closing-or-Post-Deleted) or by reporting the opening post of the thread and stating your request that way.
> I assume you're talking about [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114401)? If that's the one, I can remove it as soon as you want.

That is the thread and I would be very grateful if you will remove it.
